scripts.docker:firefox: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSER=firefox PLAYWRIGHT_HEADLESS=true PLAYWRIGHT_REPORTER=line docker-compose up --build playwright-custom
scripts.docker:rerun-firefox: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSER=firefox PLAYWRIGHT_HEADLESS=true PLAYWRIGHT_REPORTER=line docker-compose up playwright-custom
scripts.docker:safari: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSER=safari PLAYWRIGHT_HEADLESS=true PLAYWRIGHT_REPORTER=allure-playwright docker-compose up --build playwright-custom
scripts.docker:rerun-safari: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSER=safari PLAYWRIGHT_HEADLESS=true PLAYWRIGHT_REPORTER=allure-playwright docker-compose up playwright-custom
